rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever an artifact creature you control dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. It’s an artifact and has retrofit. The retrofit cost is equal to its mana cost plus discard a card. [i](It’s not a creature. You may it from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. Spells cast this way are 4/4 artifact creatures and lose retrofit.)[/i]
